articles.title: Ford's Lower-cost EVs Play Into Biden's Infrastructure Reduction Act Plans
articles.description: Tesla competition aside, there's another likely reason Ford is lowering it's electric vehicle prices.
articles.content: Ford is increasing its Mustang Mach-E electric vehicle (EV) production in 2023 and decreasing prices in response to the numerous business environment factors. Tesla recently reduced the prices of its… [+2572 chars]

articles.title: DOJ Demands Documents Related to Tesla's 'Self Driving' Feature
articles.description: The Department of Justice is seeking documents related to the self-driving feature in Tesla cars, the electric automaker revealed in filings today.
articles.content:
The Department of Justice is seeking documents related to the self-driving feature in Tesla cars, the electric automaker revealed in filings today.
